products.title: Gibson Lilac Mist Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The pale purple gibson lilac mist is ideal for lighter rooms, or for pairing with light purple or blue furniture. Match this in with your bathroom towels to create a coherent colour in the bathroom. Being 100% waterproof makes this blind perfect for in
products.productdescription: The pale purple gibson lilac mist is ideal for lighter rooms, or for pairing with light purple or blue furniture. Match this in with your bathroom towels to create a coherent colour in the bathroom. Being 100% waterproof makes this blind perfect for installing in your bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Gibson Powder Grey Roller Blind
products.metadescription: The light gibson powder grey is on the paler side of grey. This is on the subtle side and would look great against a darker decor. The lighter grey will help enhance and lift the room. Use this in any room in your home as it is fire retardant and 100%
products.productdescription: The light gibson powder grey is on the paler side of grey. This is on the subtle side and would look great against a darker decor. The lighter grey will help enhance and lift the room. Use this in any room in your home as it is fire retardant and 100% moisture resistant - ideal for bathrooms. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material. All of their blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the british blind and shutter association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.Makeitsafe.Org.Uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with their roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.
